item.title: Troubleshooting a mysterious Python test failure
item.description: Context At my day job my colleagues and I develop a data gathering and visualisation platform that has a fair bit of Python behind the scenes. We test a lot of this Python using pytest and all our tests are run by a large locally hosted instance of TeamCity. A test run involves TeamCity executing a bash script responsible for setting up any test dependencies (usually Docker containers) and then executing the test itself (also usually a Docker container).
